miniapp.name: Mintara Token Builder
miniapp.subtitle: No-Code Token Creation on Base
miniapp.description: Mintara Token Builder is the easiest no-code tool to create, deploy, and manage your own ERC-20 tokens on the Base network. Secure, fast, and reliable.
miniapp.tagline: Your Token, Your Rules. No Code.
miniapp.ogTitle: Mintara Token Builder: No-Code ERC-20 on Base
miniapp.ogDescription: Create, deploy, and manage your own tokens on the Base network instantly.
